text: Medicine sometimes snatches away health, sometimes gives it.
author: Ovid

text: I was always shocked when I went to the doctor's office and they did my X-ray and didn't find that I had eight more ribs than I should have or that my blood was the color green.
author: Nicolas Cage

text: In the name of Hypocrites, doctors have invented the most exquisite form of torture ever known to man: survival.
author: Edward Everett Hale

text: The doctors x-rayed my head and found nothing.
author: Dizzy Dean

text: I'm 86 and my doctor used to tell me to slow down - at least he did until he dropped dead.
author: Cesar Romero
